product_name: Petzl Charlet Lynx Leverlock Modular Crampons
long_description: From snow couloirs to mixed climbing routes, the Petzl Lynx Leverlock Modular crampons have a versatile design that will keep you climbing higher no matter the terrain. Crampons come with interchangeable front bindings to adapt to boots with or without toe welts; steel wires fit boots with toe welts and flexible bindings fit boots without. Configuration and length of front points can be modified with 1 screw-set the crampons up with dual points in short, long or asymmetric position. You can also set the crampons up with offset mono-points in the short or long position. Leverlock heel bails are designed for boots with heel welts; height of bails can be adjusted. Low-profile Antisnow(R) plates help prevent sticky snow from balling up beneath your feet without interfering with the projection of the points. Crampons come with medium-length linking bars that fit boot sizes U.S. 5 - 11 (EU 35 - 45); long linking bars are sold separately. Petzl Lynx Leverlock Modular crampons come with the Fakir carrying bag.
